verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came again unto me<WH559>, saying,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, there were two<WH8147> women<WH802>, the daughters<WH1323> of one<WH259> mother<WH517>:

And they committed whoredoms<WH2181> in Egypt<WH4714>; they committed whoredoms<WH2181> in their youth<WH5271>: there were their breasts<WH7699> pressed<WH4600>, and there they bruised<WH6213> the teats<WH1717> of their virginity<WH1331>.

And the names<WH8034> of them were Aholah<WH170> the elder<WH1419>, and Aholibah<WH172> her sister<WH269>: and they were mine<WH3205>, and they bore sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>. Thus were their names<WH8034>; Samaria<WH8111> is Aholah<WH170>, and Jerusalem<WH3389> Aholibah<WH172>.
And Aholah<WH170> played the prostitute<WH2181> when she was mine<WH8478>; and she doted<WH5689> on her lovers<WH157>, on the Assyrians<WH804> her neighbors<WH7138>,
Which were clothed<WH3847> with blue<WH8504>, captains<WH6346> and rulers<WH5461>, all of them desirable<WH2531> young men<WH970>, horsemen<WH6571> riding<WH7392> upon horses<WH5483>.

Thus she committed<WH5414> her whoredoms<WH8457> with them<WH4005>, with all them that were the chosen men<WH1121> of Assyria<WH804>, and with all on whom she doted<WH5689>: with all their idols<WH1544> she defiled herself<WH2930>.

Neither left<WH5800> she her whoredoms<WH8457> brought from Egypt<WH4714>: for in her youth<WH5271> they lay<WH7901> with her<WH6213>, and they bruised the breasts<WH1717> of her virginity<WH1331>, and poured<WH8210> their whoredom upon her<WH8457>.
Therefore I have delivered<WH5414> her into the hand<WH3027> of her lovers<WH157>, into the hand<WH3027> of the Assyrians<WH1121>, upon whom she doted<WH5689>.

These discovered<WH1540> her nakedness<WH6172>: they took<WH3947> her sons<WH1121> and her daughters<WH1323>, and killed<WH2026> her with the sword<WH2719>: and she became famous<WH8034> among women<WH802>; for they had executed<WH6213> judgment upon her<WH8196>.

And when her sister<WH269> Aholibah<WH172> saw<WH7200> this<WH7843>, she was more corrupt in her inordinate love<WH5691> than she<WH8457>, and in her whoredoms more than her sister<WH269> in her whoredoms<WH2183>.

She doted<WH5689> upon the Assyrians<WH1121> her neighbors<WH7138>, captains<WH6346> and rulers<WH5461> clothed<WH3847> most gorgeously<WH4358>, horsemen<WH6571> riding<WH7392> upon horses<WH5483>, all of them desirable<WH2531> young men<WH970>.
Then I saw<WH7200> that she was defiled<WH2930>, that they took both<WH8147> one<WH259> way<WH1870>,

And that she increased<WH3254> her whoredoms<WH8457>: for when she saw<WH7200> men<WH582> portrayed<WH2707> upon the wall<WH7023>, the images<WH6754> of the Chaldeans<WH3778> portrayed<WH2710> with vermilion<WH8350>,

Girded<WH2289> with belts<WH232> upon their body<WH4975>, exceedingly<WH5628> in dyed attire<WH2871> upon their heads<WH7218>, all of them princes<WH7991> to look to<WH4758>, after the manner<WH1823> of the Babylonians<WH1121> of Chaldea<WH3778>, the land<WH776> of their nativity<WH4138>:
And as soon as she saw<WH4758> them with her eyes<WH5869>, she doted<WH5689> upon them<WH7971>, and sent messengers<WH4397> unto them into Chaldea<WH3778>.

And the Babylonians<WH1121> came<WH935> to her into the bed<WH4904> of love<WH1730>, and they defiled<WH2930> her with their whoredom<WH8457>, and she was polluted<WH2930> with them<WH5315>, and her mind was alienated from them<WH3363>.

So she discovered<WH1540> her whoredoms<WH8457>, and discovered<WH1540> her nakedness<WH6172>: then my mind<WH5315> was alienated<WH3363> from her<WH5315>, like as my mind was alienated<WH5361> from her sister<WH269>.
Yet she multiplied<WH7235> her whoredoms<WH8457>, in calling to memory<WH2142> the days<WH3117> of her youth<WH5271>, where she had played the prostitute<WH2181> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.
For she doted<WH5689> upon their paramours<WH6370>, whose flesh<WH1320> is as the flesh<WH1320> of donkeys<WH2543>, and whose issue<WH2231> is like the issue<WH2231> of horses<WH5483>.
Thus you called to memory<WH6485> the lewdness<WH2154> of your youth<WH5271>, in bruising<WH6213> your teats<WH1717> by the Egyptians<WH4714> for the breasts<WH7699> of your youth<WH5271>.

Therefore<WH172>, O Aholibah, thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Behold<WH5782>, I will raise up your lovers<WH157> against you<WH5315>, from whom your mind is alienated<WH5361>, and I will bring<WH935> them against you on every side<WH5439>;

The Babylonians<WH1121>, and all the Chaldeans<WH3778>, Pekod<WH6489>, and Shoa<WH7772>, and Koa<WH6970>, and all the Assyrians<WH1121> with them<WH2531>: all of them desirable young men<WH970>, captains<WH6346> and rulers<WH5461>, great lords<WH7991> and renowned<WH7121>, all of them riding<WH7392> upon horses<WH5483>.

And they shall come<WH935> against you with chariots<WH2021>, wagons<WH7393>, and wheels<WH1534>, and with a assembly<WH6951> of people<WH5971>, which shall set<WH7760> against you shield<WH6793> and shield<WH4043> and helmet<WH6959> round about<WH5439>: and I will set<WH5414> judgment<WH4941> before<WH6440> them<WH8199>, and they shall judge you according to their judgments<WH4941>.

And I will set<WH5414> my jealousy<WH7068> against you<WH6213>, and they shall deal furiously<WH2534> with you<WH5493>: they shall take away your nose<WH639> and your ears<WH241>; and your remnant<WH319> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719>: they shall take<WH3947> your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323>; and your residue<WH319> shall be devoured<WH398> by the fire<WH784>.
They shall also strip<WH6584> you out of your clothes<WH899>, and take away<WH3947> your fair<WH8597> jewels<WH3627>.

Thus will I make your lewdness<WH2154> to cease<WH7673> from you<WH2184>, and your whoredom brought from the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>: so that you shall not lift up<WH5375> your eyes<WH5869> unto them<WH2142>, nor remember Egypt any more<WH4714>.

For thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Behold<WH5414>, I will deliver you into the hand<WH3027> of them whom you hate<WH8130>, into the hand<WH3027> of them from whom your mind<WH5315> is alienated<WH5361>:

And they shall deal<WH6213> with you hatefully<WH8135>, and shall take away<WH3947> all your labor<WH3018>, and shall leave<WH5800> you naked<WH5903> and bare<WH6181>: and the nakedness<WH6172> of your whoredoms<WH2183> shall be discovered<WH1540>, both your lewdness<WH2154> and your whoredoms<WH8457>.
I will do<WH6213> these things unto you<WH2181>, because you have gone a whoring after<WH310> the heathen<WH1471>, and because you are polluted<WH2930> with their idols<WH1544>.
You have walked<WH1980> in the way<WH1870> of your sister<WH269>; therefore will I give<WH5414> her cup<WH3563> into your hand<WH3027>.

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; You shall drink<WH8354> of your sister<WH269>'s cup<WH3563> deep<WH6013> and large<WH7342>: you shall be laughed to scorn<WH6712> and had in derision<WH3933>; it contains<WH3557> much<WH4767>.

You shall be filled<WH4390> with drunkenness<WH7943> and sorrow<WH3015>, with the cup<WH3563> of astonishment<WH8047> and desolation<WH8077>, with the cup<WH3563> of your sister<WH269> Samaria<WH8111>.

You shall even drink<WH8354> it and suck it out<WH4680>, and you shall break<WH1633> the shards<WH2789> there<WH5423>, and pluck off your own breasts<WH7699>: for I have spoken<WH1696> it<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>.

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Because you have forgotten<WH7911> me<WH7993>, and cast me behind<WH310> your back<WH1458>, therefore bear<WH5375> you also your lewdness<WH2154> and your whoredoms<WH8457>.
The Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> moreover unto me<WH1121>; Son of man<WH120>, will you judge<WH8199> Aholah<WH170> and Aholibah<WH172>? Yes<WH5046>, declare unto them their abominations<WH8441>;

That they have committed adultery<WH5003>, and blood<WH1818> is in their hands<WH3027>, and with their idols<WH1544> have they committed adultery<WH5003>, and have also caused their sons<WH1121>, whom they bore<WH3205> unto me<WH5674>, to pass them through the fire<WH402>, to devour them.
Moreover this they have done<WH6213> unto me<WH2930>: they have defiled my sanctuary<WH4720> in the same day<WH3117>, and have profaned<WH2490> my sabbaths<WH7676>.

For when they had slain<WH7819> their sons<WH1121> to their idols<WH1544>, then they came<WH935> the same day<WH3117> into my sanctuary<WH4720> to profane<WH2490> it<WH6213>; and, behold, thus have they done in the midst<WH8432> of my house<WH1004>.

And furthermore<WH637>, that you have sent<WH7971> for men<WH582> to come<WH935> from far<WH4801>, unto whom a messenger<WH4397> was sent<WH7971>; and<WH935>, behold, they came: for whom you did wash<WH7364> yourself<WH3583>, painted your eyes<WH5869>, and decked<WH5710> yourself with ornaments<WH5716>,
And sat<WH3427> upon a stately<WH3520> bed<WH4296>, and a table<WH7979> prepared<WH6186> before<WH6440> it<WH7760>, whereupon you have set my incense<WH7004> and my oil<WH8081>.

And a voice<WH6963> of a multitude<WH1995> being at ease<WH7961> was with her<WH582>: and with the men of the common sort<WH7230> were brought<WH935> Sabeans<WH5436> from the wilderness<WH4057>, which put<WH5414> bracelets<WH6781> upon their hands<WH3027>, and beautiful<WH8597> crowns<WH5850> upon their heads<WH7218>.
Then said<WH559> I unto her that was old<WH1087> in adulteries<WH5004>, Will they now commit<WH2181> whoredoms with her<WH8457>, and she with them?

Yet they went in<WH935> unto her<WH935>, as they go in unto a woman<WH802> that plays the prostitute<WH2181>: so went they in<WH935> unto Aholah<WH170> and unto Aholibah<WH172>, the lewd<WH2154> women<WH802>.

And the righteous<WH6662> men<WH582>, they shall judge<WH8199> them after the manner<WH4941> of adulteresses<WH5003>, and after the manner<WH4941> of women that shed<WH8210> blood<WH1818>; because they are adulteresses<WH5003>, and blood<WH1818> is in their hands<WH3027>.
For thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; I will bring up<WH5927> a company<WH6951> upon them<WH5414>, and will give them to be removed<WH2189> and spoiled<WH957>.

And the company<WH6951> shall stone<WH7275> them with stones<WH68>, and dispatch<WH1254> them with their swords<WH2719>; they shall kill<WH2026> their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323>, and burn up<WH8313> their houses<WH1004> with fire<WH784>.
Thus will I cause lewdness<WH2154> to cease<WH7673> out of the land<WH776>, that all women<WH802> may be taught<WH3256> not to do<WH6213> after your lewdness<WH2154>.
And they shall recompense<WH5414> your lewdness<WH2154> upon you<WH5375>, and you shall bear the sins<WH2399> of your idols<WH1544>: and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>.
